content: This is exactly what I needed! I've been working from home for two years and never considered EMF exposure. Going to start with moving my router away from my desk.
Great starting point, Sarah! Moving the router is one of the highest-impact changes you can make. Let me know how it goes!
I bought the Trifield TF2 after reading this article. The readings around my desk were shocking! Already ordered ethernet cables to replace my WiFi setup.
Fantastic comparison of EMF meters! I was torn between the TF2 and the HF32D. Your breakdown helped me choose the TF2 as a beginner.
Perfect choice, Lisa! The TF2 is ideal for getting started. Once you're comfortable with the basics, you can always upgrade to more specialized equipment later.
I implemented the phone-free bedroom rule and noticed better sleep within just a few days. Amazing how much difference such a simple change can make!
The 30-day challenge sounds perfect! I've been struggling with sleep for months. Starting with morning light exposure tomorrow. Will report back with results!
